fplr 0.1.0.9000

    • Introduction to fplr

Retrieve an FPL user's performance data

fpl_get_user_performance.Rd

Retrieve an FPL user's performance data, obtained via the bootstrap-static JSON.

fpl_get_user_performance(user_id)

Arguments

user_id

FPL user ID (retrieve from a user's team page on the FPL site).

Value

a list

Examples

fpl_get_user_performance(user_id = 123)
#> $chips
#>   played_time_formatted status     name                 time chip entry event
#> 1          19 Aug 21:53 played wildcard 2018-08-19T20:53:41Z    1   123     3
#> 2          16 Jan 18:11 played wildcard 2019-01-16T18:11:33Z    2   123    23
#> 3          02 Feb 05:44 played      3xc 2019-02-02T05:44:56Z    4   123    25
#> 
#> $entry
#> $entry$id
#> [1] 123
#> 
#> $entry$player_first_name
#> [1] "Pavlos"
#> 
#> $entry$player_last_name
#> [1] "Anagnou"
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_id
#> [1] 83
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_name
#> [1] "Greece"
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_short_iso
#> [1] "GR"
#> 
#> $entry$summary_overall_points
#> [1] 1626
#> 
#> $entry$summary_overall_rank
#> [1] 59391
#> 
#> $entry$summary_event_points
#> [1] 41
#>

#>

#> $entry$name

#>

#> [1] 2
#>
